text: Joshua ga ala aga hagaluada dono daiaa, gei ogo digau hai mee dabu mo digau dauwa ga taele haganiga di waahale be di hai i di laangi nomua: i mua go nia madaloohi, nomuli go digau hai mee dabu ala e iliili nadau labaa, ga nomuli la go digau hai mee dabu ala e aamo Tebedebe o di Hagababa Dimaadua. Ga haga muliagina go nia madaloohi i muli. Di madagoaa dela e hula ai digaula, gei nia labaa e iliili.
